summary: The Federal Aviation Administration prohibits unauthorized drone flights near airports because they can pose safety risks to other aircraft and disrupt air traffic control. Local authorities respond to these incidents with assistance from the federal government, if needed. title: Aviation Safety: Federal Efforts to Address Unauthorized Drone Flights Near Airports
